text: A business enterprise shall be eligible for certification as a local manufacturing business enterprise if the business enterprise:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 18-141, see notes following § 2-218.02.

DC CODE § 2-218.39

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Meets the definition of a local business enterprise as described in § 2- 218.31;
Makes a product through a process involving raw materials, components, or assemblies, usually on a large scale, with different operations divided among different workers;
Has an annual revenue of $2 million in the manufactured product; and
Has its principal location of manufacturing in the District of Columbia.

subchapter.text: Small, Local, and Disadvantaged Business Enterprise Development and Assistance.
